name: Nuit Blanche (Yterrey)
description:
You are a student who is submitting his thesis next morning. You shall not sleep!

-------
v1.0 was released during the first Orbital Gam Jam at Lausanne, Switzerland

Illustrated by Vulcain Boisson aka Vuljinn
Programmed by Yanis Brunet aka Oberon aka Yterrey
